Item ID24880

Amy's saw is an equippable saw that can be bought from the Mahogany Homes Reward Shop for 500 Carpenter points. It does not provide the crystal saw boost.

The saw is wielded in the weapon slot. It has combat bonuses comparable to bronze weapons.

It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player's costume room.

[[File:Amy's saw detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Amy's saw''' is an equippable [[saw]] that can be bought from the [[Mahogany Homes Reward Shop]] for 500 [[Carpenter points]]. It does not provide the [[crystal saw]] boost. 

The saw is wielded in the weapon slot. It has combat bonuses comparable to bronze weapons.

It can be stored in a [[magic wardrobe]] in a player's [[costume room]].
